review: It works well and does exactly what was stated it could do. I couldn't give it a full 5 star review because it doesn't allow for customization on the Home screen. review: It's extremely to easy for to purchase stuff that use your TV. If they don't know to only look in the 'Prime' category. No password needed or anything to confirm your purchase.  And I absolutely hated that my Fire TV  came with my amazon login and password already signed in. Way to careless on Amazons part.
